reviews.review_msg: Incredibly smart guy, frequently either made up words or used ones I'd never heard of. Rewards effort and if you put the work in you'll get a great grade. I thought his marking was the fairest of any prof I've had. Entertaining and covers a lot of material, would definitely recommend him!

Best professor I've ever had. I find it difficult to pay attention in other lectures, but this prof is so captivating and makes it easy for you to pay attention and engage. He makes all of the material easy to learn, and cares about his students. I highly recommend taking a class with him, you won't regret it.
